text: The MVG Class A is a type of train used on the Munich U-Bahn. They are the oldest trains on the Munich U-Bahn. The MVG Class A began service in 1971. They are used on every line. There are 194 trains with two cars each. 18 trains have been withdrawn. == References == *Wolfgang Pischek, Holger Junghardt: Die Münchner U-Bahn - unterirdisch durch die bayerische Landeshauptstadt. München 2012 (3. Aufl.), (in German) p. 43-53. Category:Munich Category:Rolling stock Category:1971 establishments in Germany
title: MVG Class A
